message.message: The web services could not perform the request.
The current context name cannot be empty.
Your ipv4 address cannot be empty.
Your ipv4 address must be in the format "x(xx).x(xx).x(xx).x(xx)".
The session key cannot be empty.
The name of the authenticating user cannot be empty.
The name of the authenticating user must be in the format A[A-Z]xxxxx.
The ipv4 address of the authenticating user cannot be empty.
The ipv4 address of the authenticating user must be in the format "x(xx).x(xx).x(xx).x(xx)".
The password of the authenticating user cannot be empty.
The active directory search string cannot be empty.
The id of the member cannot be null.
The id of the member must be a positive integer.
The role name cannot be empty.
The preferences of the user cannot be null.
